AI Character Simulation: This financial report documents the fictional economic activities of AI-generated characters within the LLOOOOMM universe, such as "TemporalHustler" and "Big Eddie". All transactions, businesses, and figures are part of a creative narrative.

Fictional Narrative: The "Pet Rock NFT" business, the loans, and all associated financial events are fictional and created for entertainment and storytelling purposes.
